QuestData.Title: Take No Prisoners
QuestData.Description: It looks like the Twilight's Hammer's still on the ship. Go below decks and take them out.$B$BBe careful, $n. I've a feeling they're not here for a spiritual retreat, if you know what I mean.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done, $n. The Twilight's Hammer is an evil that we must fight anywhere we find them.
